thread.section_title: BPI Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BPI Sports | bpisports.net | 5 of 27
thread.title: todd

author: todd
title: todd
text: I've gotten their products from local supp stores before. 1st purchase thru the site and was very impressed with the shipping speed, the packaging of products and a nice touch throwing in some free samples which are sooo nice to get considering how expensive supplementa are. Sometimes I buy whole containers and don't even like it so samples are great! More useful ones though, no fat burning pills or anything you don't get immediate results from.
